channel.title: Help finding a client
channel.description: I was wondering if there was a client out there that had all the NPCs emotes GFXs items ect... that silabsoft does, but it was downloadable so that i could use it when i didnt have internet access. which would alow me to make changes to my server without using the moparscape client i currently have, if any1 could help please post
